question: What do I need to include in my household income in regards to COVID-19 relief?
text:
What do I need to include in my household income in regards to COVID-19 relief?
          
        
Economic Stimulus Payments
You 
do not
 need to include either of the one-time economic stimulus payments listed above when reporting your income to 
Pennie
.
Unemployment Compensation
You 
do need
 to include all unemployment compensation you may be receiving, including regular 
unemployment compensation from the Commonwealth
 and additional federal unemployment benefits, when reporting your income to Pennie. This includes:


Pandemic Unemployment Assistance (PUA) - You should include any PUA you may be receiving in the income you report in your Pennie application.




Pandemic Unemployment Compensation (PUC) - You should include PUC, in addition to regular unemployment compensation, when reporting your income in your Pennie application.
